means.word_mean: 诽谤的;含有诽谤文字的

sentences.en: The book was libelous, so the publishers had to call in all copies of it from the bookshops.
sentences.cn: 这是一本诽谤性的书，所以出版商必须把店里的书全收回去。

sentences.en: I’m afraid we can’t print your story on the fraud scandal,it might be libelous.
sentences.cn: 对不起,我们不能发表你写的那篇有关欺骗丑闻的报道,因为它可能构成诽谤。
